reviews.title: Small basic apartment, good for a group maybe
reviews.date: Fecha del comentario: 1 de septiembre de 2023
reviews.negative_feedback:
Wifi was very poor and only served for phone connection despite the best efforts of the caretaker. There is only a small breakfast bar in the room with very low stools so definitely no use for sitting down other than for a quick bite. There are 2 sofas. Terrace is small and slide door is broken. But biggest issue is that the aircon exhaust box is there so if its on you get blasted with hot air. Also no chairs or table there so you can only stand.
The apatrment building is just on a side-street back from malecon but behind high-rise Hotel Internacional which thus blocks the view of the beach/sea. You can see either side of it obviously so still some nice views but it is not "beachfront" and given the other issues with the terrace I got no value from it.
reviews.positive_feedback: There is a very friendly caretaker on-site in the building who lets you in and out and can guide. Shower was good. Pool was nice. It's a bit outside the main area which I liked but obviously a little less secure aroundabout because of that.
